author: steven w
title: Last minute NYC trip - Review
text:
Great Times Square location and close to various theaters, restaurant and shops. Small lobby and chic petite comfortable room. Good value and excellent hotel to rest after dinning, shopping and theater.
Room Tip: Corner Time Square room provide an excellent...it can be noisy till 3-4 am...but it is part of the N... See more room tips
